mechanics.condition: Target is a creature you can see AND reach AND target is NOT Undead
mechanics.outcome: Target makes a Wisdom Saving Throw. On a failed save, target becomes Paralyzed for the spell's duration.
Spell has no effect on the target.

mechanics.condition: Target is currently Paralyzed by Hold Monster
mechanics.outcome: Target makes a new Wisdom Saving Throw. On a successful save, the Paralyzed condition from this spell ends for the creature.

description_text: Choose a creature you can see and reach. The target must make a saving throw of Wisdom or be paralyzed for the duration of the spell. This spell has no effect against the undead. At the end of each round, the target can make a new saving throw of Wisdom. If successful, the spell ends for the creature.
